title.newValue: Microsoft Stream: Insert and playback videos in Word and PowerPoint

description.newValue: This feature allows customers to insert Stream (on SharePoint) videos into PowerPoint and Word using the existing "Insert Online Video" feature in those apps. Video playback happens inline within Word and PowerPoint with enhanced playback features such as transcripts, captions, search, chapters, and playback speed controls. Stream (on SharePoint) videos are videos stored in a user's OneDrive Business account or in SharePoint.Â Note: Video insertion will be available on desktop client and web, but not on mobile. Video playback will be available on desktop client, web and mobile. PowerPoint for Mac is supported; however, Word for Mac is not supported.
